PHRASE.LANG:
We Got the Peeps features a bundle of some cool characters. Chim Peep, Techno Peep and Super Powered Peep come packaged as Heavy Pets, Companions and Mini-Peeps! Nine fantastic treats in one big bundle! Colors as shown.
 This set includes the following items.


・Chim Peep - Black on Black
 ・Chim Peep - Static Mini - Black on Black
 ・Chim Peep - Heavy Pet - Black on Black
 ・Techno Peep - Glowing Green
 ・Techno Peep - Static Mini - Glowing Green
 ・Techno Peep - Heavy Pet - Glowing Green
 ・Super Powered Peep - Ricochet Red
 ・Super Powered Peep - Static Mini - Ricochet Red
 ・Super Powered Peep - Heavy Pet - Ricochet Red


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

We Got the Peeps offre une panoplie de quelques caractères branches. Chim Peep, Techno Peep et Super Power Peep groupe comme Heavy Pets, Compagnons et Mini-Peeps! Neuf gâteries formidables en une grande panoplie! Couleurs comme montrées.[#Legal]

We Got the Peeps kommt als Bündel voller cooler Characktäre. Chim Peep, Techno Peep und Super Power Peep kommen verpackt als Heavy Pets, Freundschatfs- und Mini Peeps! Neun fantastische Figuren in einem Bündel! Farben wie abgebildet. [#Legal]

We Got the Peeps ha un peculiare mucchio di personaggi molto fighi. Chim Peep, Techno Peep e Super Power Peep vengono impachettati come Heavy Pets, Companions e Mini-Peeps! Nove fantastiche sorprese in un unico pachetto! Colori come da mostra.[#Legal]

We Got the Peeps se caracteriza por tener un conjunto de personajes muy padres. Chim Peep, Techno Peep y Super Power Peep vienen empacados como Heavy Pets, Companions y Mini-Peeps! Nueve fantásticos regalos en un paquete único! Colores como la muestra.[#Legal]

We Got the Peeps는 환상적인 캐릭터 번들입니다. Chim Peep, Techno Peep 및 Super Powered Peep을 Heavy Pet, 컴패니언, Mini-Peep 패키지로 만나실 수 있습니다! 하나의 번들로 9개의 환상적인 조합! 색상은 나타난 바와 같습니다.
본 세트에는 하기 아이템이 포함되어 있습니다. 


●Chim Peep - 블랙온블랙
 ●Chim Peep - Static Mini - 블랙온블랙
 ●Chim Peep - Heavy Pet - 블랙온블랙
 ●Techno Peep - 발광하는 초록
 ●Techno Peep - Static Mini - 발광하는 초록
 ●Techno Peep - Heavy Pet - 발광하는 초록
 ●Super Powered Peep - 통통튀는 레드
 ●Super Powered Peep - Static Mini - 통통튀는 레드
 ●Super Powered Peep - Heavy Pet - 통통튀는 레드


※ 상기 모든 아이템들은 이 번들 구입과 동시에 적절한 카테고리에서 이용할 수 있습니다.[#Legal]

達人Peep組合包是突出角色的集合。組合包中的Chim Peep、Techno Peep和Super Powered Peep分別擁有三種型態：Heavy Pets、隨身夥伴和Mini-Peeps！一個組合包，給您九種驚喜！顏色如圖所示。
 本組合包含以下商品。


●Chim Peep - 終極黑
 ●Chim Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 終極黑
 ●Chim Peep - Heavy Pet - 終極黑
 ●Techno Peep - 螢光綠
 ●Techno Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 螢光綠
 ●Techno Peep - Heavy Pet - 螢光綠
 ●Super Powered Peep - 跳躍紅
 ●Super Powered Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 跳躍紅
 ●Super Powered Peep - Heavy Pet - 跳躍紅


※ 購買組合包後，以上所有物品都會加入相關的類別中。[#Legal]
